entry.title: FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT, Saint-Nicéphore
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:11 AM EDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Periods of wet snow or rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of wet snow changing to periods of rain near noon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 60%
